case.title: The main page contain ‘Sign in to your account' form
The main page contains the ‘Sign Up" link
The main page contains the "Sign Up with Google" link
The "Sign In" form should contain the "Email" required field
The "Sign In" form should contain the "Password" required field
The "Sign In" form should contain [Sign In] button
The "Sign In" form should contain "Forgot password" link
The user can sign in to filling all required fields
The user can sign in with already registered credentials
The user can sign in by entering in the "Email" field already registered email
The user can't Sign In without the dot symbol (.) in the "Email" field
The user can't Sign In without the At symbol (@) in the "Email" field
When the user enters an invalid email in the "Email" field, the validation message appears
The user can't Sign In without the username before the 'at" symbol in the "Email" field
The user can't sign in without the domain in the "Email" field
The user can't Sign in with multiple @ symbols in the "Email" field
The user can't sign in with an empty "Email" field
The user can't sign in with a SQL/script injection attempt in the "Email" field
The user can't sign in with long email (64+ characters before @) in the "Email" field
The user can't sign in with a long domain (over 254 total characters) in the "Email" field
The user can sign in by entering in the "Password" field already registered password
The user can sign in by entering at least one uppercase letter in the "Password" field
The user can sign in by entering at least one lowercase letter in the "Password" field
The user can sign in by entering at least one number in the "Password" field
The user can sign in by entering at least one special character in the "Password" field
When the user enters an invalid password in the "Password" field, the validation message appears:" Wrong email or password!"
The user can't sign in with empty "Password" field
The user can't sign in by entering only letters in the "Password" field
The user can't sign in by entering only numbers in the "Password" field
The user can't sign in by entering only special symbols in the "Password" field
The user can't sign in by entering only special symbols in the "Password" field
Verify that the user is not able to copy values from the "Password" field
When the users enter all valid credentials and tap on the [Sign In] button, they are redirected to the "Chat" page
When users click on the "Forgot password " link, they are redirected to the "Forgot password" page
When not logged in users click on "Sign up" link, they are redirected to " Create an account " form
The " Create an account" form should contain the "Email" required field
The " Create an account " form should contain the "Password" required field
The " Create an account" form should contain the "Repeat password" required field
The " Create an account form " form should contain a "Sign Up via Google" link
The " Create an account form " form should contain [Create an account] button
The users can sign up with valid email credentials
The user can't sign up without the dot symbol (.) in the "Email" field
The user can't sign up without the At symbol (@) in the "Email" field
When the user enters an invalid email in the "Email" field, the validation message appears
The user can't sign up without the username before the 'at" symbol in the "Email" field
The user can sign up with the subdomain in the "Email" field
The user can't sign up without the domain in the "Email" field
The user can't sign up with multiple @ symbols in the "Email" field
The user can't sign up with an empty "Email" field
The user can't sign up with unsupported symbols in the "Email" field ("!", "^", "$", "%")
The user can't sign up with a SQL/script injection attempt in the "Email" field
The user can't sign up with a long email (64+ characters before @) in the "Email" field
The user can't sign up with a long domain (over 254 total characters) in the "Email" field
The user can sign up by entering at least one uppercase letter in the "Password" field
The user can sign up by entering at least one lowercase letter in the "Password" field
The user can sign up by entering at least one number in the "Password" field
The user can sign up by entering at least one special character in the "Password" field
When the user enters an invalid password in the "Password" field, the validation message appears:" Wrong email or password!"
The user can't sign up with an empty "Password" field
The user can't sign up by entering only letters in the "Password" field
The user can't sign up by entering only numbers in the "Password" field
The user can't sign up by entering only special symbols in the "Password" field
The user can't sign up by entering only one character in the "Password" field
The users can sign up with valid password credentials
When the user taps on sign up via the "Google" icon, the Google "OAuth Authorization" page is opened
When the user taps on the [Create account] button, they redirect to the "My Chat" page

section.name: User logged in as a candidate

case.title: The "Chat" page contain [All] button
The "Chat" page contains the [Archive] button
The "Chat" page contains the Chat messages area
Before contacting the candidate in the chat, the recruiter shouldn’t be able to see the contacts of the candidate
The candidate should be able to open their contacts or decline the recruiter’s proposition and not share contact details
The "Profile" page contain “Profile” link
The "Profile" page contain “Contact” link
The "Profile" page contain a “Preferences” link"
When user taps on “Profile” link, they redirected to " Preview profile" page
“Preview profile” page contain [Edit] button
When user taps on [Sign out] button, they redirected to "Sign in" page
User able to choose recruiter profile by taps on “Candidate profile” dropdown
When user sign up as a candidate, they tap on "Candidate" button
When the user taps on the "Candidate" button, they are redirected to "Profile information" page
The "Role" stage contain required “Desired position” field
The "Role" stage contain required “Select specialization” dropdown
The "Role" stage contains required “Type and select strongest tech skills” dropdown
The “Desired position” field should accept valid position text
The “Desired position” field should not accept a minimum length of 1 character
The “Desired position” field should not accept only numbers
The “Desired position” field should not accept special characters only
The “Desired position” field should not accept special characters only
The “Desired position” field should be an empty field
When the user taps on the [Save and continue] button, they are redirected to the " Expectation" stage
"Expectation" stage should contain " Desired base salary, $ " field
"Expectation" stage should contain [Annual] button
"Expectation" stage should contain [Monthly] button
"Expectation" stage should contain “Select work experience” dropdown
"Expectation" stage should contain “Select English level” dropdown
"Expectation" stage should contain “Select your location" dropdown
The " Desired base salary, $" field should accept numerical characters
The "Desired base salary, $" field should not accept alphabetical characters
The "Desired base salary, $" field should not accept contain special symbols
The "Desired base salary, $" field should not be empty
The "Desired base salary, $" field should not accept a negative values
When the user taps on the [Save and continue] button, they are redirected to the " Experience" stage
"Experience" stage should contain required “Achievement” field
"Experience" stage should contain required “Work experience” field
"Experience" stage should contain optional “Job expectation” field
The “Achievements” field should accept alphanumeric characters
The “Achievements” field should accept at least 2 characters
The “Work experience” field should accept alphanumeric characters
The “Work experience” field should accept at least 2 characters
The “Job expectation” field should accept alphanumeric characters
The “Job expectation” field should accept at least 2 characters
When the user taps on the [Save and continue] button, they are redirected to the “Contact information” page
The “Contact information” page should contain “First name” field
The “Contact information” page should contain “Last name” field
The “Contact information” page should contain “LinkedIn” field
The “Contact information” page should contain “Behance” field
The “Contact information” page should contain “GitHub ” field
The “First name” field should accept a valid user's name input
The “First name” field should not be empty
The “First name” field should accept at least 2 characters
The “First name” field should not accept only numbers
The “First name” field should not accept only special symbols
The “Last name” field should accept a valid user's name input
The “Last name” field should not be empty
The “Last name” field should accept at least 2 characters
The “Last name” field should not accept only numbers
The “Last name” field should not accept only special symbols
The “ LinkedIn ” URL field should accept a valid LinkedIn profile URL
The “ LinkedIn ” URL field should not accept non-LinkedIn URL
The “Behance” URL field should accept a valid Behance profile URL
The “Behance” field URL field should not accept a non-Behance URL
The “GitHub ” URL field should accept a valid GitHub profile URL
The “GitHub ” URL field should not accept a non-GitHub URL
When the user taps on the [Save and continue] button, they are redirected to the “Preview profile” page
When user sign up as a recruiter, they tap on "Recruiter" button

section.name: User logged in as a recruiter

case.title: The "Profile" page contain “Profile” link
The "Profile" page contain “Contact” link
The "Profile" page contain a “Preferences” link"
When user taps on [Sign out] button, they redirected to "Sign in" page
User is able to choose a candidate profile by tapping on the “Recruiter profile” dropdown
When user sign up as a recruiter, they tap on "Recruiter" button
The “My role” field should accept valid position text
The “My role” field should not accept a minimum length of 1 character
The “My role” field should not accept only numbers
The “My role” field should not accept special characters only
The “My role” field should be an empty field
The “My role” field is a required field
When the user inputs invalid credentials in the “My Role” field, a validation message appears
The “Company name” field should accept valid text
The “Company name” field should accept at least 2 characters
The “Company name” field should accept alphanumeric characters
The “Company name” field should accept special characters like (&, -, .)
The “Company name” field should not be an empty field
The “Company name” field should not accept only numbers
The “Company name” field should not accept invalid symbols
When the user input invalid credential in the “Company name” field, validation message is appeared
When the user taps on the [Save and continue] button, they are redirected to the “Preview profile” page
